revised_title: Fossil Plants: The Structure and Affinities of Medullosa anglica
tldr: The author examines the structure and affinities of fossil plants from the Paleozoic era, specifically focusing on Medullosa anglica, a representative of the cycadofilices group. The study provides insights into the organization of these ancient plants, their relationship to ferns and cycads, and their geological context in the British Coal-measures.
